Package connector.common

Class JsonUtil.JsonParserBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • connector.common.JsonUtil.JsonParserBuilder
  • Enclosing class:
    JsonUtil
    public static class JsonUtil.JsonParserBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Builder for creating a JsonParser instance.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      JsonUtil.JsonParser create()
      Creates an instance of JsonParser using the configured customizations.
      static JsonUtil.JsonParserBuilder custom()
      Returns a JsonParserBuilder object for customizations which will govern the behavior of the JsonParser.
      static JsonUtil.JsonParser defaultJsonParser()
      Returns the default customized instance of JsonParser which will skip null values in the objects while converting to Json representation and disables HTML escaping.
      JsonUtil.JsonParserBuilder disableHtmlEscaping()
      Disables HTML escaping while converting to json representation.
      JsonUtil.JsonParserBuilder serializeNulls()
      Enables serialization of null values in the json representation.
      JsonUtil.JsonParserBuilder setDateFormat​(java.lang.String dateFormat)
      Set Date Formatting while converting json to String representation.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
